content: अनुसारक, --सारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Following, pursuing, going after, attendant on; तामभ्यगच्छद्रुदितानुसारी <ls>R. 14. 70</ls>; मृगानुसारिणं पिनाकिनं <ls>Ś. 1. 6.</ls>; परिमलः पवनानुसारी <ls>Dk. 91</ls>; कृपणानुसारि च धनं <ls>Pt. 1. 278</ls> going after, falling to the lot of. {@--2@} According or conformable to, following; यथाशास्त्र° <ls>Ms. 7. 31.</ls> {@--3@} Seeking, looking out for, investigating, scrutinizing; <ls>Ms. 7. 102.</ls>
